akn:section.akn:heading: Requirements for international banking corporation activities.

akn:content.akn:p: An international banking corporation may transact a banking business, or maintain in the District of Columbia an office for carrying on such business, or any part thereof, if the corporation has:
An international banking corporation may engage in representational and other activities in the District of Columbia, other than those specified in ยง 26-635, only as authorized in ยง 26-636.
Any person who establishes or maintains an office or transacts business in the District of Columbia in violation of this section shall be subject to the penalties imposed by ยง 26-103(g).
